Posts.Title: Need to decide one breast or two? catemarie catemarie

Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2008 08:52AM mrsdoty wrote: My drain stayed in 10 days after my right mast.   My surgeon just felt it was time to take it out but for the first week I put out about 80 ccs every 24 hours....I was so glad when they took it out because I could  finally sleep comfortably and swim....swimming was great exercise to get my full range of motion back...good luck!!!
Posts.Title: How long do drains stay in? HeatherBLocklear new2bc

Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2008 05:10AM mrsdoty wrote: Hey girl...keep doing your thing, As long as your fluid doesn't turn bright red again your OK.  I'm so glad you are not letting this thing get you down and stop you from doing what you have to do.    Stay strong and keep your head up there are lots of people praying for you!!!!!!!!
